fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core

Class StoreMessageAttachment

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core.StoreMessageAttachment

  • public class StoreMessageAttachment
extends Object
    Utility class to encapsulate an attachment file with content and metadata.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StoreMessageAttachment

        public StoreMessageAttachment(Object storeContent,
                              String attachmentStoreScheme,
                              String name,
                              java.util.Date creationDate,
                              java.util.Date modificationDate,
                              String mimeType,
                              String contentID,
                              int attachmentType)
        Instantiates a new attachment with binary content.

        The MimeType is normalized to application/* if type unknown and application/octet-stream if all unknown

        Parameters:
        storeContent - Object to be used by the store extractor or byte[] if simple binary
        attachmentStoreScheme - Store scheme defining store extractor or "file" if simple binary
        name - Name
        creationDate - Creation Date
        modificationDate - Last modification Date
        mimeType - MimeType
        contentID - Mime multipart content ID useful for inline
        attachmentType - Type of attachment (inline, simple file, another store...)
